main event: A couple observed a round, silver object traveling at high speed in the sky while en route to Portland from The Dalles, Oregon on December 26, 1952.
interesting points: The object was round and silver in color,The object was traveling from southwest to northeast at a high rate of speed,It was silent and left no trail or vapor,The sighting lasted for approximately one minute before it disappeared,The couple did not hear any sound during the sighting.
